items.preText: Shakib has three, Afghanistan five down, here's Nabi
items.text: drives the ball to cover where the fielder dives to his right to save one
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: defends in front of the stumps and gets an inside edge onto his pad
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: slightly shorter this time and he goes back this time to help it to leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: leans forward for the wider delivery on off and he finds cover
items.postText: Only two runs and a wicket in Shakib's last two overs
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: pushes this one down to long off for one easily
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: he takes a step down and flicks it to long on for one
items.postText: Ramas: "230 will be great score for Afghanistan to defend with their bowlers" Long way to go from here
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: goes back in the crease and punches the ball to long on
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: gets some room and he cuts it off the back foot to deep point
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: not much room on off, he's on the back foot and finds point
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: slightly fuller and he sends it back to long off for one more
items.postText: It's time for some drinks. Shakib has stifled the Afghanistan middle order here with three wickets, still 15 overs to go and only five wickets in hand. Can they get close to 250? Akshay will find out with you...
items.shortText: Mominul Haque to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.preText: Thanks, Vishal. Bangladesh in complete control here. This is not what Afghan had imagined when he opted to bat at the toss. By his own admission, this is a good batting track. One of the better surfaces in the tournament, in fact. Afghanistan have got lots of catching up to do.
items.text: short of a length on off, carves a punch away through point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mohammad Nabi, 2 runs

items.text: length ball around the sixth-stump line, gets the foot across and blocks to point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: rolls his fingers over a length ball, Nabi presses forward and defends into the covers
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: short of length on off, stands tall and punches to cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: cuts in off the seam from a length, cuts him in half as he attempts to put it away with a punch and the ball shoots past the inside edge
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: short of good length on off stump, waits and punches to point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: flighted towards off, drilled out to long-off
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: full, sliding towards middle, pushed back
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: leg-stump fuller ball, clipped past a diving short midwicket
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: plants the front foot across and drives back off the inside of the bat
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: full and flighted on middle, wristily pushes down to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: stays back to a fuller one and turns it away to midwicket
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: edged and taken. Hangs back at the crease and opens the face to run it down to third man. But the bowler has given him minimal room here, and that results in an outside edge that settles into the hands of the keeper Liton
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hashmatullah Shahidi, OUT

dismissal.text: Hashmatullah Shahidi c †Liton Das b Rubel Hossain 58 (92b 3x4 0x6) SR: 63.04

items.text: short of good length outside off, punched off the backfoot and point dives to his right to stop it
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Gulbadin Naib, no run

items.preText: "Another day, another crucial breakthrough by Rubel Hossain. So underrated, one of those players to whom stats dont do justice," feels Mahneel Musa
items.text: length around off, jabbed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Gulbadin Naib, no run
